channel.title: The search for a hoster!?!?!?!?!
channel.description: Well for the past 4 month's i have been searching for a HOSTER but yet every one i got could not host 24/7 or already had a post the Server Status Page well im getting tired of this i want my server to come online and my players to be happy again i just need a hoster who can host 24/7 or 20/7 or even 15/7 has the newest jdk the newest java has port forward already and has the newest net frameworks(optional) to use voule auto restarter if there is a hoster like this please leave a post[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2008, 09:07:37 PM[/size][hr]Anyone

item.title: The search for a hoster!?!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

I host it myself but i don’t know how to port forward on a at&t router

Read full topic

item.title: The search for a hoster!?!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Pay your electric bill and just leave the computer on, getting a 24/7 host does NOT mean they baby-sit a server. That means its a baby server. My server runs on a computer in my basement, and stabilizing a Winterlove descendant server is nearly impossible anyway.

Read full topic
